content:
Yes, I can definitely assist you with that. Here are some of the restaurants from the list that offer vegetarian options for their Okonomiyaki:

1. Mizuno Okonomiyaki
2. Chibo
3. Kiji
4. Okonomiyaki Kiji
5. Ajinoya
6. Okonomiyaki Chitose

You can check their menu to see the vegetarian option available. This should help you narrow down your choices before making a reservation.
